alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 6:01PM EST until February 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet by Saturday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
